narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Itzel Carrillo is a Occupational Therapist provider based in El Paso, TX. From 2021-06 through 2021-11, this provider received $71K in Medicaid payments across 846 claims serving 204 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 2.5× the national median for 97530 (97530), at $84 per claim vs. the median of $33, placing them above the 90th percentile.
100% of billing is concentrated in 97530 (97530), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2021-11, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
